nodes.documentation:
@title BaseRewardAddressList
@dev Implements the logic to store, add and remove reward account addresses. Works as a linked list.
nodes.name: BaseRewardAddressList

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves all registered reward accounts.
@return address list of the registered reward receivers.
nodes.name: rewardAddressList

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.
@return length of reward addresses list.
nodes.name: rewardAddressCount
isRewardAddress
getNextRewardAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for adding a new reward address to the linked list.
@param _addr new reward account.
nodes.name: _addRewardAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for removing existing reward address from the linked list.
@param _addr old reward account which should be removed.
nodes.name: _removeRewardAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for initializing linked list with the array of the initial reward addresses.
@param _rewardAddresses initial reward addresses list, should be non-empty.
nodes.name: _setRewardAddressList

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for updating the length of the reward accounts list.
@param _rewardAddressCount new linked list length.
nodes.name: _setRewardAddressCount
_setNextRewardAddress

attributes.documentation:
@title BaseRewardAddressList
@dev Implements the logic to store, add and remove reward account addresses. Works as a linked list.
attributes.name: BaseRewardAddressList

attributes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves all registered reward accounts.
@return address list of the registered reward receivers.
attributes.name: rewardAddressList

attributes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.
@return length of reward addresses list.
attributes.name: rewardAddressCount
isRewardAddress
getNextRewardAddress

attributes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for adding a new reward address to the linked list.
@param _addr new reward account.
attributes.name: _addRewardAddress

attributes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for removing existing reward address from the linked list.
@param _addr old reward account which should be removed.
attributes.name: _removeRewardAddress

attributes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for initializing linked list with the array of the initial reward addresses.
@param _rewardAddresses initial reward addresses list, should be non-empty.
attributes.name: _setRewardAddressList

attributes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for updating the length of the reward accounts list.
@param _rewardAddressCount new linked list length.
attributes.name: _setRewardAddressCount
_setNextRewardAddress

getNextRewardAddress(address).details: Retrieves next reward address in the linked list, or F_ADDR if given address is the last one.
getNextRewardAddress(address).return: address of the next reward receiver.

isRewardAddress(address).details: Checks if specified address is included into the registered rewards receivers list.
isRewardAddress(address).return: true, if specified address is associated with one of the registered reward accounts.

rewardAddressCount().details: Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.

rewardAddressList().return: address list of the registered reward receivers.
